import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./furnitureSection.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{fetchData}from'../../OurCategories/dataApi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FurnitureSection=_ref=>{let{handleFurnitureClick}=_ref;const[Furnitures,setFurnitures]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);// جلب بيانات الأثاث
useEffect(()=>{const fetchFurniture=async()=>{try{const result=await fetchData('Furniture');setFurnitures(result);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchFurniture();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Furniture-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"All in Furniture"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/Furniture",className:"see-more",children:["See More ",'>']})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Furniture-grid",children:[loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:error}),Furnitures.map(Furniture=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Furniture-card",onClick:()=>handleFurnitureClick&&handleFurnitureClick(Furniture.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Furniture.images,alt:Furniture.title,className:"Furniture-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Furniture-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:Furniture.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Furniture-description",children:Furniture.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"Furniture-price",children:["Price: ",Furniture.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"Furniture-location",children:["Location: ",Furniture.location]})]})]},Furniture.id))]})]});};export default FurnitureSection;
